description: Position of Balancing Test section in the motion. Balancing test is a key legal requirement for sealing/pseudonym motions.
chroma_query_template: balancing test privacy interest public interest {case_context}

recommendations.critical: Include a Balancing Test section and place it prominently (not buried at the end).
recommendations.rationale: Balancing test is a key legal requirement. Earlier placement = more prominence. Average position in granted motions: 5.3.
recommendations.insight: Including required legal elements is important, but WHERE you place them also matters.

suggestions: Place it prominently (not buried at the end)
Show how privacy interests outweigh public interest
Use enumeration to structure the balancing factors
